SqlTemplate.GetForm1Equipment: SELECT DISTINCT(EQUIPMENT) FROM FDC_INDICATOR_DEF_INFO order BY EQUIPMENT
SqlTemplate.GetForm1Chamber: SELECT DISTINCT(CHAMBER) FROM FDC_INDICATOR_DEF_INFO fidi WHERE fidi.EQUIPMENT = :Equipment order BY CHAMBER
SqlTemplate.GetForm1Recipe: SELECT DISTINCT(RECIPE) FROM FDC_INDICATOR_DEF_INFO fidi WHERE fidi.EQUIPMENT = :Equipment AND  fidi.CHAMBER = :CHAMBER order BY RECIPE
SqlTemplate.GetForm1ConditionQueryData: SELECT EQUIPMENT , CHAMBER , RECIPE , "PARAMETER" , RECIPE_STEP AS step, HEAD_BEGIN AS headBegin, TAIL_BEGIN AS tailBegin, HEAD_END AS HEADEND , TAIL_END AS TAILEND , STATISTIC , USL , LSL , UCL , LCL , UWL , LWL FROM FDC_INDICATOR_DEF_INFO fidi WHERE fidi.EQUIPMENT = :Equipment AND fidi.CHAMBER = :CHAMBER AND FIDI .RECIPE  = :RECIPE and  IS_ACTIVE ='Y' ORDER BY RECIPE
SqlTemplate.UpDataFdcIndicatorDefInfoHasIndicatorNam: UPDATE FDC_INDICATOR_DEF_INFO SET IS_ACTIVE ='N' WHERE INDICATOR_NAME =:INDICATORNAME
SqlTemplate.GetTransferModelEquipment: SELECT DISTINCT(EQUIPMENT)    FROM FDC_INDICATOR_DEF_INFO fidi  ORDER BY EQUIPMENT
SqlTemplate.GetTransferModelChamber: SELECT DISTINCT(CHAMBER)   FROM FDC_INDICATOR_DEF_INFO fidi WHERE EQUIPMENT IN :EQUIPMENT  ORDER BY CHAMBER
SqlTemplate.GetTransferModelRecipe: SELECT DISTINCT(RECIPE)  FROM FDC_INDICATOR_DEF_INFO fidi WHERE EQUIPMENT IN :EQUIPMENT AND CHAMBER IN :CHAMBER ORDER BY RECIPE
